item.title: HtBT: Your 250 making 250 story and a case study – Ep 377 [HTBT]
item.description:
Sponsors: Use "HTBT" at check out to get 10% off EVERYTHING at https://kingsmengroomingpros.com We talk about one of your 250 companies started and a case study for you to practice on how to consult for a company. What are you going to do to grow this business?

CAST STUDY FACTS

High-end portable restroom business.

Rather than Porta-potties

We bring in trailers that feature running water

Flushing toilets

 Lights

 AC/heat

 handicap accessibility.

  • We specialize in outdoor weddings and can even operate in remote off grid areas without power or water.
  • I started this as a side hussle about 6 years ago and last year full time.
  • I am building my fifth trailer to be operating this summer.

o   After 5 trailers, I think that I will need to start hiring a part time driver to keep up.

 

How do I actually build the business to make it of value to sell.

  • I know that “single truck” businesses are not usually worth much.
  • But with this business, it is hard to hire anyone but part time.
  • All of my money is made between May and October with the bulk of it being last two weeks of June through the first week of October.

item.title: HtBT: Ep 288 – Enneagram is the new Gnosticism [HTBT]
item.description:
We discuss great stuff today. Notes from show: George Gurdjieff – Eastern Orthodox then turned away. Meet Mystical Islam and other religions. He Taught the Enneagon. ( No points but the universe could be seen and describe all of reality in this) PD Ouspenskii was a pupil of George – Added the idea of three areas of man heart mind instinct Oscar Ichazo – school in Chile called Arica. He was an occult teacher. Claudio Naranjo – Learned about the Enneagon from Ichazo. He said on video they use to say it was an ancient source but now they admit it came from a “higher source”. He said he came up with the 9 character source from observation but mostly from “automatic writing”. Automatic Writing - a claimed psychic ability allowing a person to produce written words without consciously writing. The words purportedly arise from a subconscious, spiritual or supernatural source. Esalen Institute – Claudio went there, a think tank for new age and psychological therapy experiments. Bob Ox – Came to Esalan Jesuit and brought these teachings into the Catholic church Richard Rohr - learned of it who is a Christian Mysticism and Perennial teacher. Mysticism is not the Holy Spirit interactions it’s a method of thought you learn to tap into the spiritual world “The Enneagram Institute®, created in 1997 by the late Don Richard Riso and by Russ Hudson, was formed to further research and development of the Enneagram, one of the most powerful and insightful  tools for understanding ourselves and others.   At its core, the Enneagram helps us to see ourselves at a deeper, more objective level and can be of invaluable assistance on our path to self-knowledge.” Gnosticism Relating to Knowledge especially esoteric mystical knowledge. Click here to be part of Reformgelical. Join our monthly book club by clicking here. This month's book Never Split the Difference.
